description_for_human: Agent to manage users security settings and groups they own.
description_for_model: This agent allows users to manage their security settings and groups they own in Microsoft Entra ID. It can list the groups a user belongs to and the groups they own.

conversation_starters.text: What groups do I belong to?
Who are the owners of the 'Marketing Leads' group?
Can I join the Sales group?
How do I request access to a private group?
Who was added or removed from my groups recently?
What devices are registered to my account?
When was each of my devices last used?
What organizations am I a part of?
How do I switch between my organizations?
When was my last successful sign-in?
Were there any unsuccessful sign-in attempts recently?
From which locations have I signed in recently?
What devices have I signed in from?

functions.name: user_ListMemberGroups
functions.description: List the groups that the current user belongs to.

functions.name: user_ListOwnedGroups
functions.description: List the groups that the current user owns.

functions.name: me_authentication_ListMethods
functions.description: List the authentication methods registered by the user.

functions.name: me_ListOwnedDevices
functions.description: List the devices owned by the user.

functions.name: me_updateCurrentUser
functions.description: Get or update the user's profile.

functions.name: listSignIns
functions.description: Summarize the sign-in records for the user.
